original_title: Osmanen Germania OGBC - Rockers oder Boxclub?
overview: They are considered the fastest growing rocker-like association in Germany. According to own data the "Ottoman Germania" already have more than 2000 members.They are happy to expose their brutal and arbitrary ideals. They attract a lot of young immigrant men. They have close relations with the AK parti in Turkey. They chant; son kan damlasına, to the last drop of blood.
title: Osmanen Germania OGBC - Rockers oder Boxclub?
